main event: A pilot on a B-47 aircraft observed a bright white-yellowish oval object in the Azores on March 16, 1956.
interesting points: The object appeared to be rotating and moved rapidly before disappearing,The pilot observed the object at an altitude of 35,000 ft,The object was much brighter than the stars,The estimated speed of the object was approximately 3000 mph,The entire observation lasted for about 3 minutes.
